title: Core Web Vitals Page Report - Standard
description: This Wrkflow generates a core web vitals page report and emails to the specified addresses.
guide:
# Core Web Vitals Report
Get a top 25 list of pages core web vitals. This Workflow queries Grail and sends email(s) of your choice.

# Setup
1. Change emails (`to`, `cc`, `bcc`) to be an array of strings.
2. Test with a manual Run, by click the `Run` button.
3. If everything works as expected, change the [Trigger](?trigger=) to a schedule, e.g. Weekly, Daily, etc.

# More advanced interactions
Consider using our MCP server, [local](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/dynatrace-mcp) or [remote](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/discover-dynatrace/platform/davis-ai/dynatrace-mcp ).

cwv_query.name: cwv_query

input.query:
fetch user.events, from: @d-1d, to: @d
| filter characteristics.has_page_summary or characteristics.has_w3c_navigation_timings
| filter isNotNull(page.name)
| summarize {
    wlcp = if(isNull(percentile(web_vitals.largest_contentful_paint, 75)), 0, else:percentile(web_vitals.largest_contentful_paint, 75)), 
    wcls = if(isNull(percentile(web_vitals.cumulative_layout_shift, 75)), 0, else:percentile(web_vitals.cumulative_layout_shift, 75)), 
    winp = if(isNull(percentile(web_vitals.interaction_to_next_paint, 75)), 0, else:percentile(web_vitals.interaction_to_next_paint, 75)), 
    Count = countIf(characteristics.has_w3c_navigation_timings)
  }, by: { page.name, dt.rum.application.entity }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.application = dt.rum.application.entity
| fieldsAdd Application = entityName(dt.entity.application)
| fieldsRemove dt.entity.application
| fields App=Application, Page = page.name, `Count` = Count, CWVScore = if(((wcls >= .1) or (toDouble(wlcp) >= 2500000000) or (toDouble(winp) >= 200000000)), "❌Fail", else: "✅Pass"), `LCP(ms)` = wlcp/1000000, `INP(ms)` = winp/1000000, `CLS(#)` = round(wcls,decimals:4)
| sort Count desc
| limit 25

cwv_query.description: Make use of Dynatrace Grail data in your workflow.

tenant_query.name: tenant_query

input.query:
fetch dt.entity.environment
| fields URL=concat("[Open in Dynatrace](http://",dt.system.environment,".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.experience.vitals/frontends)")
| limit 1
